thread.section_title: PromGirl Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PromGirl | www.promgirl.com | 10 of 539
thread.title: Christine

author: Christine
title: Christine
text: This was a very good shopping experience. My items arrived quickly and were better than I expected (high quality and really beautiful). The return process was simple. My only complaint is about the 10% re-stocking fee for an item that has been barely touched and still has tags on it. Because it's hard to tell what a true fit will be, I ordered two sizes of the same dress and it was a bummer to have to spend $30+ on a dress that I returned. But in the end, I'm very happy with this experience overall.
